text:
[[Var-Shalas]] is home to the Shanutar—the Council of
Lords—which brings together both [[zaelantar]] and [[zaeltairn]] leaders of the [[Tairnadal]]. This isn’t a ruling body, but a place for the lords of the armies and villages to share news and
resolve grievances. The [[Keepers of the Past|Spirits of the Past]] mediate the Shanutar; each village’s //tar-shan// ("peace lord") has a place on the council, and each army is represented by the two shans whose clans are stationed at Var-Shalas.
title: Shanutar
